colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(DE LTAR DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I TSOGS 'JI LTAR BYA BA'I TSUL 'DI NI, SLOB DPON SH'ANTI PAS MDZAD PA'I 'JIGS BYED TSOGS MCHOD DU NANG GI RNAL 'BYOR GTZO CHE BA LAS LAG LEN HA CANG MI GSAL BA DANG, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA GONG MAS STZAL BA'I 'JIGS BYED TSOGS MCHOD LA GZHI BYAS TE BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED, ,GYUR BA'I DAM CHEN PO LUNG RTOGS YON TAN DU MAS NYE BAR PHYUG PA'I LCANG SKYA MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE NAS BSKUL MDZAD PA LTAR GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA'I THA SHAL BA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, DRUNG YIG TSANGS SKYES BLO @008B LDAN NO DAM TSIG RNAM DAG GYUR BAR SHOG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
